channel.title: R Markdown on Davi Simon's blog and site
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Davi Simon's blog and site

item.title: Gestão de Carteiras de Investimento
item.description:
Neste post, um estudo sobre o conceito de diversificação no contexto de carteiras de investimento.

A referência principal é o livro citado abaixo:

Regenstein, Jr., Jonathan K.. Reproducible Finance with R: Code Flows and Shiny Apps for Portfolio Analysis (Chapman & Hall/CRC The R Series). CRC Press. Kindle Edition.

item.title: My first post
item.description: First post First things first. Why having a website? I have a lot of code and ideas to share. Why now? Had to start it at some point. What will I blog about? Accounting, Corporate Finance, Governance (Public and Corporate), Pension Funds. R programming Language, Stata, Rmarkdown. Some others things will show up, I suppose. Will I update it frequently? Highly likely. How did I do it? https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/ How long did it take?
